channel.title: [317] How To Add Starting Point[Need Help][317]
channel.description:
Need help making every new player start in Edgeville, and if possible help with adding what everyone starts with like food or money etc.
Thanks -Elmo

item.title: [317] How To Add Starting Point[Need Help][317]
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Either add it in the initiate method, or go to player class and add it. Just search for what they current start off and use the ‘addItem’

example:

addItem(ID, amout);

For starting place, search the current coords in player class/ client class and change them to the new ones by doing ::mypos

Read full topic
